channel.title: How to make npc's drop items?
channel.description: I want to spawn barrows brothers outside of the tunnel things, and I need to know how to make a npc drop an item and how to set the drop rate for that item :)

item.title: How to make npc's drop items?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“Arcane Mage, post:1, topic:375462”]I want to spawn barrows brothers outside of the tunnel things, and I need to know how to make a npc drop an item and how to set the drop rate for that item :)[/quote]What base?

If Delta then data/npcdrops.cfg or something like that

Read full topic
